permission_warning: 設定 > アプリケーション > {app_name} > 権限
permission_warning_guide: 通知権限はオプションです
permission_ok: 動きの検出時や動きがない場合にアラームを受け取るため。

member_pin_set_complete: 確認用PINが完了しました
member_no_people: {1}の個人デバイスを削除してもよろしいですか
member_no_people_guide: メンバーを登録してください
error_pair_not_mainrouter_title:
家族メンバーの個別の在席通知を
受け取るため
error_pair_not_mainrouter_body: エラー：メインルーターではありません
common_mins: エクステンダーのQRコードのスキャンは許可されていません。登録を進めるにはメインルーターのQRコードをスキャンしてください。
error_duplicated_siginin: あなたの場所への接続を確認
error_duplicated_siginin_guide: 重複プロフィールのサインインが検出されました
error_duplicated_profile: 誰かがプロフィール{1}でサインインしました。これがあなた自身か家族メンバーであるか確認してください。
error_duplicated_profile_guide: 同じプロフィールが使用中
report_family_activity: 同じプロフィールがすでに使用中です。このプロフィールでサインインすると、前のユーザーはサインアウトされます。
report_family_activity_guide: 家族のアクティビティ時間
report_spend_time: あなたの場所で検出された動きデータの合計時間
report_spend_time_more: 家族が自宅で一緒に過ごした時間
report_spend_time_less: 昨日より約{1}時間多く家族と一緒に過ごしました！
report_family_activity_no: 昨日より約{1}時間少なく家族と一緒に過ごしました！
report_spend_time_guide1: 本日は自宅で家族メンバーが検出されませんでした。
report_data_missing: 家族が一緒に過ごした時間には、短時間の登録も含めて計算されています。
report_empty_time: 一部のデータが欠落しているため、計算は利用可能なデータに基づいています。
report_empty_time_guide: 場所が空いている時間
report_previous_day: 家族全員が外出していた時間
report_latenight_action:
昨日は場所が空いている時間が
検出されませんでした。
report_latenight_action_no: 午後11時から午前4時の間に動きが検出された時間
report_making_guide: 深夜の時間帯に動きは検出されませんでした。
report_making_guide1: 現在、あなたの家族の日報を作成しています
report_your_family:
自宅での日々の動きと在席を分析中です。
毎晩12時に更新されます。
しばらくお待ちください！
home_loading_fail:
動きと無動作のアラームを設定するには、
メインメンバーを通じてセンシング位置を登録する必要があります。
member_check_connection_guide:
現在データが利用できません。
ページを更新するか、後でもう一度確認してください。
common_close: please ensure it is connected to your main router.
sensing_list_add_guide2: カバレッジエリアを拡大するためにセンシング位置を追加してください。
selectpeople_pinnumber_forgot_guide: メインメンバーを通じてカバレッジエリアを拡大するためにセンシング位置を追加してください。
onboarding_guide_2: MoniはPINをリセットするためのメールを送信します。メールボックスを確認してください。メールが見つからない場合は、迷惑メールフォルダを確認してください。
alarm_not_access: 子供や親の在席状況をどこからでも確認できます。
alarm_not_access_guide: アラーム設定にアクセスできません
add_alarm_day_of_week_guide: 通知を受け取り、アラーム設定にアクセスするには、個人デバイスの登録が不可欠です。
common_enter_mobile_number: ニックネームを入力してください
place_scan_qr_guide4: 携帯番号を入力してください
common_not_now: メインルーターのインターネット接続状態を確認してください
add_all_sensinglocation_detailed:
#NOT# The installed router's Place has been assigned.
You need at least one Extender for sensing to work. It is being automatically detected.
add_all_sensinglocation_addinfo2: #NOT# The extender must be connected to your main router.
add_all_sensinglocation_addinfo3: #NOT# We don't support third-party devices as sensing location devices yet.
add_all_sensinglocation_noextender_detai: #NOT# It appears that there is no extender near {1}. If only the main router is available, you and your family's motion detection will require an extender to be connected to the main router.
add_all_sensinglocation_norouter_detail1: #NOT# Check if the main router’s power is on
add_all_sensinglocation_norouter_detail3: #NOT# If you turn on the main router now, it may take 1 to 2 minutes to connect.
add_all_sensinglocation_quit_guide: #NOT# Are you sure you want to quit adding the sensing location and go to the profile creation page?
add_all_sensinglocation_detected_detail: #NOT# An extender has been detected! Once it's connected, sensing will begin immediately.
add_all_sensinglocation_extender_error: #NOT# If an extender is unavailable, it can be added later once its status is restored. Alternatively, if it is powered on, you can change its position and refresh this page.
set_sensitivity_detail: #NOT# Applying sensitivity to the Place will also apply it to all Sensing Locations below. To adjust individually, use the sliders.
set_sensitivity_quit_guide: #NOT# Are you sure you want to quit Set Sensitivity Level and go to the profile creation page?
set_sensitivity_success_guide: #NOT# Adding your extender as sensing location is complete. now the motion sensing is starting in your place.
set_sensitivity_large_guide: #NOT# Large movements (running, jumping) in the Place are detected, and notifications are triggered.
set_sensitivity_regular_guide: #NOT# Regular movements (walking, gestures, sitting) in the Place are detected, and notifications are triggered.
set_sensitivity_small_guide: #NOT# Small movements and changes in the Place are sensitively detected, and notifications occur frequently.
set_sensitivity_small_custom: #NOT# The sensitivity level for each Sensing Location is set individually.
create_profile_continue_guide: #NOT# You've already added your place! You have only one step left to start Moni, the best family safety management app.
home_add_allmembers_guide: #NOT# Add your family members in one step, easily check each person’s status, and safeguard the love and safety of your family.
home_add_allsensing_guide: #NOT# Moni has found {1} Extenders as your sensing locations. Add them now to get started.
home_set_sensitivity_guide: #NOT# You can't adjust sensitivity details without a compatible extender connected to the main router.
set_sensitivity_quit_guide2: #NOT# You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit without saving and return to Home?
add_allmembers_fill_members: #NOT# Fill the profiles of your family
add_allmembers_set_members: #NOT# Set the profiles of your family
add_allmembers_members_detail: #NOT# Set up profiles for everyone living together in your home.
add_allmembers_choose_detail: #NOT# This profile represents your family member. You can also edit member list > Profile
add_allmembers_addpersonal_detail: #NOT# Personal Device is essential to get notified presence and absence of your members.
add_allmembers_addpersonal_guide: #NOT# If you do not have a personal device for this member you can add later
add_allmembers_delete_last_detail: #NOT# If you delete the last member, you'll be taken back to the previous member selection page.
add_allmembers_add: #NOT# Are you sure to add {1} members in your {2}.
add_allmembers_personal_guide: #NOT# Get notified for the member presence and absence.
common_session_expired_detail: #NOT# Your session has expired. Please sign in again to continue.
common_connection_error_detail:
#NOT# Something went wrong.
 Please check your mobile network connection status and try again.
setting_clear_cache_detail: #NOT# In the Android environment, "Clear Cache" deletes data, whereas here, "Clear Cache" is a process to optimize the app.
set_sensitivity_low_guide: #NOT# The higher the sensitivity, the smaller movements will be detected.
place_add_check_router: #NOT# Your router has been successfully scanned using the Moni app. Please continue with the following steps.
add_allmembers_maxerror_body: #NOT# You can invite up to 8 members only. Please remove an existing member to add a new one.
error_place_add_location_head: #NOT# Error: Unable to Add Sensing Location
error_place_add_location_norouter: #NOT# The main router is disconnected or the network connection is unstable. Please check the connection and try again.
signup_pod_addplace_mainguide: 午後10時から午前6時の間に動きが検出された時間
signup_addplace_pod_guide: #NOT# Press the WPS button to activate motion sensing.
signup_addplace_pod_guide1: #NOT# Check the Moni Pod's LED status to confirm power.
place_scan_pod_guide: #NOT# To seamlessly pair, scan the QR code on your Moni Pod.
place_scan_pod_network_body: #NOT# This device brings the surrounding network and analyze connected devices and the network environment.
place_scan_pod_network_info1: #NOT# Adjust Scan Range for Better Performance
place_scan_pod_network_info2: #NOT# To hide a personal device from detection, connect it to a different Wi-Fi network than the one used by this Moni Pod.
place_scan_pod_qr_guide: #NOT# Ready to pair your Moni Pod?
place_scan_pod_qr_guide1: #NOT# Make sure your Moni Pod is compatible with this app and is turned on.
place_scan_pod_qr_guide2: #NOT# Have the QR code on the back of your Moni Pod ready to scan.
place_scan_pod_qr_guide3: #NOT# Make sure your Moni Pod’s internet status is working.
place_pod_pair_success_guide: #NOT# Your Moni pod has been successfully paired with the Moni app. Enjoy the Family Care service.
sensing_pod_find_sub: #NOT# This feature helps you locate your device by triggering an LED indicator from the device.
sensing_pod_control_led_sub: #NOT# This feature allows you to adjust the brightness of the device's LED for optimal visibility and comfort.
sensing_pod_check_led_sub: #NOT# Your Moni Pod is now signaling with LED indicators. Follow the lights to locate it easily.
place_no_pod_guide: #NOT# No device found. Please check if it is connected to the same network as your Moni Pod.
sensing_pod_not_found_sub: #NOT# We couldn't connect to your Moni Pod. Please check its network and power status, then try again.
sensing_pod_brightness_level_success: #NOT# The Brightness level setting change is saved
create_place_sign_out_warning_guide: #NOT# Are you sure you want to sign out from this page? Completing the 'Create Place' process is essential to use the Moni service.
place_already_pod_paired_guide: #NOT# This Moni Pod is already registered.Please power off the current Moni Pod, then turn on the new device you wish to register and try again.
common_pod_command_loading_sub: #NOT# We’re verifying the status of your Moni Pod through our server. This may take 1–2 minutes. Please wait.
place_scan_qr_permission_title: #NOT# Please allow access to your camera
place_scan_qr_permission_guide: #NOT# Moni needs camera access to complete this process. This access is used only when needed and does not store any images or videos.
weekreport_register_guide_body: #NOT# Check its motion and member weekly trend at a glance.
weekreport_no_report_guide_title: #NOT# No Weekly Report at this week!
weekreport_no_report_guide_body: #NOT# Please check the below condition to generate weekly report.
weekreport_check_guide_1: #NOT# Stable Connection of the main router
weekreport_check_guide_2: #NOT# More than 2 days data are required to generate general trend
weekreport_check_guide_3: #NOT# More than 4 days data are required to analyst its pattern with ai system
weekreport_check_guide_4: #NOT# At least one sensing location and member should be included
weekreport_busy_gathering_title: #NOT# I'm busy gathering lots of data!
weekreport_busy_gathering_body: #NOT# We need to collect data for a week to analyze the patterns. Please hang tight!
weekreport_make_report_title: #NOT# Now, we’re making a weekly report of your family
weekreport_make_report_body: #NOT# We're analyzing weekly motion and presence at home, with updates every monday. Please wait!
weekreport_report_guide_body: #NOT# Your past 7 days' pattern gathered from {1} has been precisely analyzed by our powerful AI system. Take a look at these AI-powered features.
weekreport_who_most_unexpected_event: #NOT# Who made the most unexpected events?
weekreport_pattern_guide_title: #NOT# Moni is learning the patterns of your space and its members.
weekreport_pattern_guide_body: #NOT# Once a complete week’s data is collected, we’ll provide you with even more accurate insights!
weekreport_no_data_available_msg: #NOT# No data available for this day.
weekreport_no_data_available_body: #NOT# Data for this feature is not available for this week.
weekreport_unexpected_absence_guide: #NOT# Over the past {1} days, your family experienced an average of {2} Unexpected Absences per day.
weekreport_unexpected_presence_guide: #NOT# Over the past {1} days, unexpected presence was detected at abnormal times in your place.
weekreport_unexpected_motion_guide: #NOT# Over the past {1} days, Some Unexpected Motions are detected when it’s abnormal time in your place.
weekreport_late_night_action_guide: #NOT# Over the {1} days, your family earned an average of {2} activities a day at night.
weekreport_time_with_family_guide: #NOT# Over the {1} days, your family spent an average of {2} hours per day together.
weekreport_place_empty_time_guide: #NOT# Over the {1} days, your family earned an average of {2} activities a day at night
weekreport_weekday_place_empty_time: 場所が空いている時間
weekreport_no_unexpected_absence_this_we: #NOT# No Unexpected Absence at This Week.
weekreport_no_unexpected_presence_this_w: #NOT# No Unexpected Presence at This Week.
weekreport_no_unexpected_motion_this_wee: #NOT# No Unexpected Motion at This Week.
add_location_maxerror_body: #NOT# You have reached the maximum limit of 10 sensing locations. To add a new location, please delete an existing one and try again.
weekreport_noone_home: #NOT# No one was home this week.
report_no_report_guide_title: #NOT# No Daily Report for this day!
report_no_report_guide_body: #NOT# Please check the below condition to generate daily report.
report_check_guide_2: #NOT# More than 1 days data are required to generate daily trend
report_latenight_action_guide2: #NOT# Time when motion is detected between 10 PM and 6 AM
account_delete_guide1: #NOT# Deleting your account will permanently remove all Place and Member data associated with it.
account_delete_guide2: #NOT# This action cannot be undone—once deleted, your account and data cannot be recovered.
account_delete_guide3: #NOT# To access Motion Sensing Data again, you will need to sign up and go through the setup process from the beginning.
account_delete_success_guide: #NOT# Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted. Thank you for using Moni.
account_delete_success_popup_guide2: #NOT# You can sign in with this email anymore as you’ve deleted it.
common_service_center_day:
#NOT# Weekday : AM 10:00 ~ PM 05:00
Closed on weekend and public holidays
account_delete_confirm_guide: #NOT# Are you sure you want to delete this account and all related data? This action cannot be undone.
alarm_emergency_guide: #NOT# Press the device button to send an emergency notification.
permission_bluetooth_guide: #NOT# Enable BT to pair and register your Moni Pod during setup.
create_palce_choose_how_sub: #NOT# The easiest way is using WPS. if your router doesn’t support it or it’s hard to access, BT paring is available
create_palce_choose_wps_sub: #NOT# Fast and automatic. Most router support this.
create_palce_choose_bt_sub: #NOT# For routers without WPS or if the button is hard to press.
pod_easymesh_guide1_title: #NOT# You must connect your Moni Pod to the router’s Wi-Fi network.
pod_easymesh_guide1_subtitle: #NOT# Power on your mesh router and Moni Pod. Make sure they're placed close to each other.
pod_easymesh_guide2_title: #NOT# Step1: Press the Router’s WPS Button.
pod_easymesh_guide2_guide: #NOT# To connect the nerwork of your Moni Pod. Press your router’s WPS button first.
pod_easymesh_guide3_title: #NOT# Step2: Press the Moni Pod’s WPS Button.
pod_easymesh_guide3_guide: #NOT# To connect the nerwork of your Moni Pod. Press your Moni Pod’s WPS button first.
pod_easymesh_guide4_guide: #NOT# During WPS, the LED flashes green. If the connection fails, it will flash red rapidly for 5 seconds.
pod_power_check_subtitle: #NOT# Power on your Moni Pod, Booting might take about 1 - 2 min(s).
pod_bt_guide1_title: #NOT# Step1: Turn on the BT setting of Mobile
pod_bt_guide1_guide: #NOT# To start pairing, please enable BT on your mobile device. This allows Moni to find and connect to your Moni Pod nearby.
pod_bt_guide2_title: #NOT# Step 2: Press the WPS Button on the Moni Pod
pod_bt_guide2_guide: #NOT# Press and hold the WPS button on the top of your Moni Pod for about 3 seconds.
pod_bt_guide3_title: #NOT# Step 3: Check the Moni Pod LED status
pod_bt_guide3_guide: #NOT# The LED will start flashing blue when it’s ready to connect.
pod_bt_guide4_guide: #NOT# When the connection is successful, the LED will turn solid green.
pod_power_check_subtitle1: #NOT# Detecting Moni Pod now, it may take 1 - 2 min(s). Please wait.
pod_pod_power_ensure: #NOT# Ensure your moni pod’s powere is on.
pod_bt_setting_error_sub: #NOT# To register your Moni Pod and create a Place, BT must be enabled on your device. Please follow the guide below to turn it on.
pod_bt_setting_error_tunoff: #NOT# BT is currently turned off. Please enable BT in your device settings to continue.
pod_bt_power_ensure: #NOT# Ensure Moni Pod is powered on.
pod_bt_closed_ensure: #NOT# Ensure Your phone is close to the device.
error_BT_notfound: #NOT# We couldn’t find your Moni Pod. Let’s try scanning again.
pod_find_BT_sub: #NOT# Your Moni Pod is ready to connect to Wi-Fi.
common_check_wifi_ready: #NOT# Ensure your Wi-Fi or mobile hotspot is ready for connection.
pod_find_multiple_BT_sub: #NOT# Please power on only one Moni Pod to continue the setup. You can add additional devices later from the Home screen.
pod_find_multiple_BT_sub1: #NOT# Please power on only one device to continue.
wifi_select_subtitle: #NOT# Select a network for your Moni Pod to connect to.
wifi_select_error_sub: #NOT# There is no network to connect your moni pod.
wifi_connect_error_dialog_body: #NOT# Please check the Wi-Fi name and password, then try again.
pod_b_paring_fail_sub: #NOT# We couldn’t connect your Moni Pod to the selected network. Please make sure your network is stable and try again.
pod_b_paring_fail_last: #NOT# If the problem persists, try selecting a different Wi-Fi or check your password.
permission_location_guide: #NOT# Allow location access to detect where your device is and improve data accuracy.
pod_find_pod_title_sub: #NOT# Press the WPS Button on the Moni Pod for 5 seconds
pod_permission_error_location_sub: #NOT# Used to find and connect your Moni Pod accurately.
pod_permission_error_bt_sub: #NOT# Required to detect and pair with your Moni Pod.
pod_bt_disconnect_error_guide: #NOT# Can’t connection to nearby device. Please check and try again.
pod_find_bt_blue_led: #NOT# If the LED isn't flashing blue, press the WPS button on your device.
pod_permission_error_title_sub: #NOT# To continue, we need your permission to access location and nearby devices.
homebanner_motion_dectect: #NOT# Motions have been detected a moment ago.
homebanner_long_no_motion: #NOT# No motion for over {1}. Are you guys away?
homebanner_night_activity: #NOT# Your Late Night activity was high.
homebanner_night_activity_up: #NOT# Your Late Night activity increased compared to yesterday.
homebanner_night_activity_down: #NOT# Your Late Night activity decreased but still high.
homebanner_activity_pattern_changed: #NOT# Your activity pattern has changed quite a lot compared to yesterday.
homebanner_activity_pattern_a_bit_change: #NOT# Looks like your activity today is a bit different from yesterday.
homebanner_first_no_motion: #NOT# No motion has been detected so far
homebanner_no_data_all: #NOT# Check your internet connection and make sure the device is turned on.
homebanner_no_data_part: #NOT# One or more devices are disconnected. Check that all are turned on.
homebanner_long_motion: #NOT# The peak movement period is between {1}:00 and {2}:00.
common_check_wifi_password: #NOT# For security, Wi-Fi networks without a password can't be added.
report_daily_motion_trend_guide: #NOT# Provides a summary of overall activity. Analyze activity changes and trends compared to the previous day.
report_late_night_activity_guide: #NOT# Analysis of Nighttime Activity from 10 PM to 6 AM
report_time_everyone_was_out_guide: #NOT# Times when all family devices are off the network
report_week_trend_guide: #NOT# Review your home's rhythm last week by comparing motion and presence patterns by day and time.
report_absence_unexpect_time: #NOT# Absence detected at an unexpected time.
report_occ_unexpect_time: #NOT# Occupancy detected at an unexpected time.
report_daily_insight_motion1: #NOT# Motion wasn’t detected by {1} for past 24 hours. Please check Moni Pod's position and connection status.
report_daily_insight_motion2: #NOT# The peak movement period is between {1}:00 and {2}:00.
report_daily_insight_night_action1: #NOT# Take care of your health. There were a lot of nighttime activities.
report_daily_insight_night_action2: #NOT# Take care of your health. Your nighttime activity increased compared to yesterday.
report_daily_insight_night_action3: #NOT# Nighttime activity decreased but still high. Take care of your health.
report_daily_insight_motion_diff1: #NOT# Your activity pattern has changed quite a lot.
report_daily_insight_motion_diff2: #NOT# Looks like your activity is a bit different from the previous day.
report_daily_insight_first_motion2: #NOT# Activity started earlier than the previous day.
report_daily_insight_first_motion3: #NOT# Activity started later than the previous day.
homebanner_assistant: #NOT# Possible help signal detected by Moni Pod. Please check in at home.
homebanner_unusual_motion: #NOT# Motion detected, but it doesn't match the usual pattern.
homebanner_unusual_no_motion: #NOT# No motion detected when activity is usually observed.
homebanner_many_motion: #NOT# A lot of activity has been detected today.
report_week_insight_night_action1: #NOT# There’s been a lot of nighttime activity on this week.
report_week_insight_night_action2: #NOT# Your late-night activity increased significantly compared to last week.
report_week_insight_night_action3: #NOT# Your late-night activity decreased significantly compared to last week.
report_week_insight_night_action4: #NOT# There was a lot of late-night activity on weekdays.
report_week_insight_night_action5: #NOT# On weekdays, There was a lot of late-night activity, increased compared to the previous week.
report_week_insight_night_action6: #NOT# On weekdays, There was a lot of late-night activity, decreased compared to the previous week.
report_week_insight_night_action7: #NOT# There was more late-night activity onl weekend.
report_week_insight_night_action8: #NOT# On weekends, There was a lot of late-night activity, increased compared to the previous week.
report_week_insight_night_action9: #NOT# On weekends, There was a lot of late-night activity, decreased compared to the previous week.
report_week_first_motion: #NOT# Your first motion typically occurred around {1}
report_week_insight_motion_diff1: #NOT# Your home's activity pattern was significantly different last week.
report_week_insight_motion_diff2: #NOT# Your home's activity pattern was a little different last week.
report_unexpected_motion: #NOT# Motion detected at an unexpected time.
report_weekly_trend: #NOT# Take a quick look at last week’s movement trends in your home.
report_disconnected: #NOT# The period of time when the connection was lost.
report_no_data_filter: #NOT# The selected event hasn't been occured on this week.
